attributes.action: reduce effort on trying to combat global warming and accept that it is a natural occurance that occurs every few thousand years. Money should be invested in how we’re going to live with the problem, not trying to solve it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nothing we can do can help global warming. It happened long before we were around and it’ll happen long after we’re gone. Our planet simply goes through warm and cold spells. We need to be investing time and money into learning how to adapt to our changing planet.
